name: Craps (Datamost)
overview: From the book "Games Commodores Play". This is a dice game called Craps. To play, you wager a portion of your money on a roll of the dice. You win if the first roll is either 7 or 11. Conversely, you lose if the first roll is 2, 3 or 12. if you get a 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 or 10 on your first roll, it is referred to as a point, you must continue rolling until you roll a 7 and crap out which is a loss or match your point and win!
